thread.title: The Adventures of Kurt Busch and the Harley J. Earl Trophy
thread.title_full: The Adventures of Kurt Busch and the Harley J. Earl Trophy

title: The Adventures of Kurt Busch and the Harley J. Earl Trophy
text:
Mar 24, 2017 at 10:52a ET 0Shares AP 
After Kurt Busch won the Daytona 500, he said he was going to take the Harley J. Earl Trophy on a Stanley Cup-esque victory tour. 
For the uninformed, the team that wins the Stanley Cup in the NHL sends the trophy around to each player on the team for a day. 
Busch hasn't let the Daytona 500 trophy out of his eyes since winning it almost a month ago. 
Check out the adventures Busch and Earl have gone on over the past four weeks.
